description.zh-cn: 1947年2月27日因台湾省专卖局人员查缉私烟不当而引发的流血冲突，一名民众被枪击身亡。此事件是二二八事件爆发的直接导火索。
description.en: A violent conflict that occurred on February 27, 1947, triggered by improper actions of agents from the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau during a seizure of contraband cigarettes, resulting in one civilian being shot and killed. This event was the direct catalyst for the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾于1947年2月底发生的大规模事件。事件起因于圆环缉烟事件引爆的民怨，后迅速演变为全岛性的反抗政府运动，并最终遭到国民政府的武力镇压。
description.en: A large-scale incident that occurred in Taiwan in late February 1947. It began with public discontent triggered by the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, which quickly evolved into an island-wide anti-government movement and was ultimately suppressed by force by the Nationalist government.

description.zh-cn: 在圆环缉烟事件中贩卖私烟的寡妇，因遭查缉员用枪柄殴打致伤，成为事件的中心人物之一。
description.en: A widow selling contraband cigarettes during the Roundabout Cigarette Incident. She was struck and injured with a pistol butt by an agent, becoming one of the central figures of the event.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员，在圆环缉烟事件中为求脱身而向群众开枪，误杀市民陈文溪。
description.en: An agent of the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau. During the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, he fired into a crowd while trying to escape, accidentally killing the civilian Chen Wen-xi.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员，在圆环缉烟事件中用手枪枪柄殴打烟贩林江迈，致其头部流血昏迷。
description.en: An agent of the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau. During the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, he struck the cigarette vendor Lin Jiang-mai on the head with his pistol butt, causing her to bleed and fall unconscious.

description.zh-cn: 在自家住宅旁围观圆环缉烟事件时，被查缉员傅学通开枪误杀的20岁市民。
description.en: A 20-year-old citizen who was watching the Roundabout Cigarette Incident from near his home and was accidentally shot and killed by agent Fu Xue-tong.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省政府曾设立的机构，负责烟、酒等专卖事务。其下属人员在圆环缉烟事件中的执法行为是二二八事件的导火索。
description.en: An agency established by the Taiwan Provincial Government of the Republic of China, responsible for monopoly control over items like tobacco and alcohol. The law enforcement actions of its personnel in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident triggered the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省专卖局在台北市的分支机构。圆环缉烟事件的肇事查缉员隶属于此机构。事件发生后次日，该机构遭到愤怒的市民冲击。
description.en: The Taipei branch of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau. The agents involved in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident belonged to this office. The day after the incident, the office was attacked by an angry mob of citizens.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后初期中华民国在台湾的最高统治机关。在二二八事件中，其卫兵向抗议民众开枪，激化了冲突。
description.en: The highest governing body of the Republic of China in Taiwan during the initial post-World War II period. During the February 28 Incident, its guards fired on protesters, escalating the conflict.

nodes.id: 台灣省行政長官公署衛兵開槍事件

zh-cn: 台灣省行政長官公署衛兵開槍事件

description.zh-cn: 在圆环缉烟事件后，抗议民众集结于行政长官公署前请愿，公署卫兵无差别开枪射杀民众，造成多人死伤，是激化二二八事件的关键。
description.en: Following the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, protesters gathered in front of the Administrative Executive Office. Guards at the office indiscriminately fired upon the crowd, killing and injuring many, which critically escalated the February 28 Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的地方法院之一，负责初审圆环缉烟事件的肇事查缉员。
description.en: One of the district courts of the Republic of China, which conducted the initial trial of the agents responsible for the Roundabout Cigarette Incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高审判机关，在圆环缉烟事件的审判中，将傅学通的死刑判决改为十年徒刑。
description.en: The highest judicial body of the Republic of China. In the trial related to the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, it commuted Fu Xue-tong's death sentence to a ten-year prison term.

description.zh-cn: 林江迈的女儿。她后来对二二八事件起因的说法与主流记述存在差异，引发了历史叙述上的争议。
description.en: The daughter of Lin Jiang-mai. Her later account of the cause of the February 28 Incident differs from the mainstream narrative, leading to historical controversy.

description.zh-cn: 参与圆环缉烟事件的台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员之一，后被判无罪。
description.en: One of the agents from the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau involved in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, who was later acquitted.

description.zh-cn: 参与圆环缉烟事件的台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员之一，后被判无罪。
description.en: One of the agents from the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau involved in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, who was later acquitted.

description.zh-cn: 参与圆环缉烟事件的台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员之一，后被判无罪。
description.en: One of the agents from the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau involved in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, who was later acquitted.

description.zh-cn: 参与圆环缉烟事件的台湾省专卖局缉私组查缉员之一，后被判无罪。
description.en: One of the agents from the Anti-smuggling Group of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau involved in the Roundabout Cigarette Incident, who was later acquitted.

description.zh-cn: 圆环缉烟事件是二二八事件爆发的直接导火线。
description.en: The Roundabout Cigarette Incident was the direct catalyst for the February 28 Incident.

relationships.source: 台灣省行政長官公署衛兵開槍事件

description.zh-cn: 行政长官公署卫兵向请愿民众开枪，造成多人死伤，使得民众的情绪更加愤怒，导致二二八事件演化成全岛性的反抗政府事件。
description.en: Guards at the Administrative Executive Office fired on petitioning civilians, causing multiple casualties, which further enraged the public and caused the February 28 Incident to evolve into an island-wide anti-government movement.

description.zh-cn: 在查缉私烟过程中，缉私员叶得根用手枪枪柄敲击林江迈头部，致其流血昏迷。
description.en: During the seizure of contraband cigarettes, agent Ye De-gen struck Lin Jiang-mai on the head with his pistol butt, causing her to bleed and fall unconscious.

description.zh-cn: 缉私员傅学通为求脱身，向围观群众开枪示警，误击中在自家旁观看的市民陈文溪，致其次日死亡。
description.en: Agent Fu Xue-tong, attempting to escape, fired a warning shot into the crowd of onlookers, accidentally hitting citizen Chen Wen-xi who was watching from near his home, leading to his death the next day.

description.zh-cn: 缉烟事件发生后次日上午，愤怒的市民冲入肇事查缉员所任职的专卖局台北分局，痛殴职员并捣毁焚烧物资，造成两名职员死亡。
description.en: On the morning after the incident, an angry crowd stormed the Taipei Branch of the Monopoly Bureau where the agents involved worked, beating staff and destroying/burning property, resulting in the deaths of two employees.

description.zh-cn: 专卖局台北分局是台湾省专卖局的分支机构。
description.en: The Taipei Branch of the Monopoly Bureau was a subordinate office of the Taiwan Provincial Monopoly Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 以杀人罪判处傅学通死刑，褫夺公权终身。
description.en: Sentenced Fu Xue-tong to death for murder and deprived him of his civil rights for life.

description.zh-cn: 以伤害罪判处叶得根4年6个月有期徒刑。
description.en: Sentenced Ye De-gen to 4 years and 6 months in prison for assault.

description.zh-cn: 傅学通上诉后，最高法院将其死刑判决改判为十年有期徒刑定谳。
description.en: After Fu Xue-tong's appeal, the Supreme Court commuted his death sentence to a final verdict of ten years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 林明珠是林江迈的女儿。
description.en: Lin Ming-zhu is the daughter of Lin Jiang-mai.
